climbs.name: Randy's Crack
climbs.fa: March 2020 Randy Judycki and Scott Devlin

content.description: The crux is leaving the face and entering the crack. The crack is used to protect but you mostly climb the face to the left.
content.location: The crack that divides the wrangler wall and the wall of calamityÂ

climbs.name: No pressure
climbs.fa: March 2020 Randy Judycki, Andrew Childs, Scott Devlin and Sarah McCullough

content.description: The crux is at the top before the anchors
content.location: When using the roman wall approach go left when you hit the crags. The climb is the second one on your right or the one to the right of the crack in the corner.

climbs.name: Delayed gratification
climbs.fa: March 2020 Randy Judycki, Scott Devlin, Andrew Childs and Sarah McCullough

content.description: The crux is near the top
content.location: The first route on your right as you walk up to the crag or if you are looking at the crack in the corner is the second route to your right.

content.description: This is a new addition to Horseshoe Canyon Ranch. This is on the East side of the canyon
